name: Blue soy wax candle
description:
This is a blue-coloured wheel-thrown soy wax candle. 

Soy wax candles are a sustainable alternative to the usual paraffin wax ones. The wax is a beautiful snow white colour and is fragrance-free. What's more, when the candle has finished burning you are left with a lovely, useful pot... 

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
8cm across the base x 8cm across the rim

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.

name: Old white salt pot
description:
This is a old white-coloured wheel-thrown salt pot. 

It is perfect for a pinch of salt in the middle of the table or by the side of the cooker...

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
7.5cm across the base x 5.5cm across the rim

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.

name: Large mug
description:
This is a black-coloured wheel-thrown stoneware mug. 

This is a good-sized mug for a cup of tea. The surface is tactile and feels good under your fingers. The sides narrowing means that the hot drink keeps warm for longer. 

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
10cm across the base x 10cm high

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.

name: Blue mug
description:
This is a blue-coloured wheel-thrown stoneware mug. 

This is a light and well-balanced mug - a good size for coffee, green tea or for those who like a smaller mug for their tea. 

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
8cm across the base x 8cm high

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.

name: Old white milk jug
description:
This is a old white-coloured wheel-thrown stoneware milk jug. 

This is a wonderfully tactile pot and fits perfectly in your hand, meaning that when you pick it up you necessarily feel its surface. It is ideal for milk, vinaigrette, a small spray of flowers or, as one person bought some for, as individual jugs for custard, one for each member of the family... 

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
4cm across the lip x 7cm high

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.

name: Small black bowl
description:
This is a black-coloured wheel-thrown stoneware bowl. 

It is thinly thrown and light - ideal for sugar, dips or a little ice-cream...

The glaze is lead-free and food-safe.

description:

name: Blue beaker
description:
This is a blue coloured wheel-thrown stoneware beaker. 

It would be perfect for wine, coffee, water or tea. It is a lovely thing drinking out of a pottery cup, a more intimate experience than the cold hard feel of glass. The glaze is lead-free and food-safe. 

It has the Dove Street Pottery stamp marked on the side at the bottom.

Dimensions (approximate):
6cm across x 8cm high

Because they are handmade no two pieces are identical. They will be similar but each is unique with little imperfections natural to the handmade process. The glaze on each individual pot will vary.
